servinfo.title: Air Intake System Description
servinfo.ptxt: The main components of the air intake system are air cleaner (1), air cleaner outlet hose (2), electric throttle body (3) (for the details, refer to Electric Throttle Body System Description .), intake manifold tuning (IMT) valve (4) which adjusts the distributor pipe length of intake manifold to (A) or (B) (for J20 engine) (for the details, refer to IMT (Intake Manifold Tuning) System Description:For J20 Engine .) and intake manifold (5).
